name: Spiderhub-iotgateway
0:
”Alexa, launch spider hub”
”Alexa, start spider hub”
”Alexa, open spider hub”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spider hub
des: This skill is especially meant for a custom gateway called 'Spider hub' .It can control home appliances like bulb, flow valve via various protocols like z wave,zigbee, BLE. The primary requisite is to have our 'spider hub' gateway,connect a few devices. upon further releases, we will try to include more features.
